name: Cyberpunk Multiplayer
description:
Cyberpunk but in multiplayer... It is online fps game in cyberpunk style.

I am still working on it so game now can be bugged or bad but final product will be nice.

.v.0.12. what's new? I made new test mode (horror) and new map maze. I just wanna make new game and on this i am testing. And about cyberpunk theme: some bug fixed.
